# Resume Builder

A professional, single-page React application for building and exporting resumes in real-time.

## Project Overview
This project is a Resume Builder that allows users to input their personal details, experience, education, and skills to generate a professionally styled resume. It features a split-screen layout with an editor on the left and a live A4 preview on the right.

## Key Features
- **Real-time Preview**: Instant visual feedback as you type.
- **Multiple Templates**:
  - **Modern**: A clean, minimalist design with a header.
  - **Sidebar**: A two-column layout with a colored sidebar.
- **Dynamic Page Generation**: Automatically handles content overflow by splitting text across multiple A4 pages.
- **PDF Export**: High-quality PDF generation for printing or sharing.
- **Local Persistence**: Autosaves progress to the browser's local storage.
- **Theming**: Customizable colors and fonts.

## Tech Stack
- **Frontend**: React (v19)
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS, Vanilla CSS for print styles
- **Icons**: Lucide React
- **Printing**: react-to-print
- **Build Tool**: Create React App (react-scripts)

## Architecture
- `src/components/Editor`: Input forms and controls.
- `src/components/Preview`: Resume rendering logic (`ResumeDocument`).
- `src/components/templates`: Template definitions (`ModernTemplate`, `SidebarTemplate`).
- `src/utils`: Helper functions, including `pageGeneration.js` for layout calculations.
- `src/data`: Initial state and template registry.

## Usage
- Run `npm start` to launch the development server.
- Run `npm run build` to create a production bundle.
- Deployed via GitHub Pages.
